item.title: Experiments with UPnP
item.description: This post deals with recent observations regarding UPnP (Universal Plug and Play) protocol & Routers. In few words, thanks to this protocol, devices (such as file sharing services, games, ..) can be easily connected/deployed. First, I started to do research on my box to find relevant UPnP functionalities by hand, found some but I had trouble to exploit them. Few days ago, David Middlehurst released a tool called “UPnP Pentest Toolkit”.
